Class SelectionPage

  • java.lang.Object
    • Page
      • SelectionPage

  • public class SelectionPage
extends Page
    The SelectionPage class represents the selection page of the game. It extends the Page class and provides methods to create the scene and handle events on the selection page.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  SelectionPage.BgImageComponent
      The BgImageComponent class represents the background image component on the selection page.
      protected class  SelectionPage.CursorComponent
      The CursorComponent class represents the cursor image component on the selection page.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Page

        components

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      protected void createScene()
      Creates the scene for the selection page.
      static SelectionPage getInstance()
      Returns the singleton instance of the SelectionPage.
      static void reset()
      Resets the selection page to its default state.

      • Methods inherited from class Page

        addComponent, getComponent, getComponentsAsList, getEventHandler, getMediaComponent, getScene, setEventHandler, setMediaComponent, setScene

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static SelectionPage getInstance()
        Returns the singleton instance of the SelectionPage.
        Returns:
        the SelectionPage instance

      • reset

        public static void reset()
        Resets the selection page to its default state. It restores the default background image and crosshair image.

      • createScene

        protected void createScene()
        Creates the scene for the selection page. It sets up the label, background image, and cursor components.
        Specified by:
        createScene in class Page
